description: Celebrities of all sorts gathered Tuesday in honor of Time Magazine's 100 most influential people of 2017. And starlet Demi Lovato kicked off the New York night with pure elegance.
title: Demi Lovato dazzles in two busty gowns at Time 100 Gala
title_page: Demi Lovato dazzles in two busty gowns at Time 100 Gala | Daily Mail Online
text:
Celebrities of all sorts gathered Tuesday in honor of Time Magazine's 100 most influential people of 2017.
And starlet Demi Lovato kicked off the New York night with pure elegance.
The 24-year-old talent looked radiant in an embellished blue frock that put her ample chest on full display before switching into an equally alluring black gown.
Scroll down for video
Arrival elegance: Demi Lovato made an elegant display of her ample cleavage, attending the Time 100 Gala in New York Tuesday
On top, the Zuhair Murad gown plunged to reveal Demi's tanned cleavage besides intricate blue beading while the dress belted at the center to accentuate the star's slim waist.
Sweeping the ground, the gown's skirt added another dash of elegant sex appeal with two thigh high slits.
Demi's raven locks were styled in long, romantic curls which perfectly complimented her head to toe bronze.
Shining star: The 24-year-old star amped up the glamour with romantic waves in her hair and a head to toe glow
Chic and sexy: The Zuhair Murad gown was equal parts sexy and elegant, showing off plenty of skin while still stunning on the red carpet
Something different! Before her performance with John Legend, the starlet changed into a plunging black gown
She finished off the look with a pair of point heels in a matching dusty blue and simple blue earrings.
The Sonny With A Chance talent switched things up for her performance with John Legend later at the event.
For the Heart Attack singer's second look, she kept up the chest-baring theme in a longsleeved black gown which plunged almost all the way to her navel.
Chest is best! Demi kept the busty theme of the evening going in her second chest baring ensemble
Center stage: The former Disney starlet wowed on stage
Dynamic duo! Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds were one of the night's most handsome pairs
There was no shortage of starpower on the Lincoln Center's red carpet.
Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively appeared as one of the evening's most handsome duos.
The Shallows starlet stole the spotlight in embroidered Marchesa with a plunging lace neckline while Ryan looked ever dapper in a blue tux.
Blake later posed with industry icon Harvey Weinstein.
Gold standard! The Gossip Girl topped off her look with gold heels
Fringe appeal! The blonde bombshell absolutely stole the show in her embroidered gown from Marchesa
Legend: Blake posed with industry legend Harvey Weinstein at the gala
Making an entrance: The supermodel commanded attention, arriving in a sweeping cape paired with plenty of jewels
Supermodel stunner: Naomi Campbell made a chic appearance in Azzedine Alaia
Purple princess: Viola Davis was the epitome of glamour in her purple Armani gown
Supermodel Naomi Campbell made a dramatic entrance, commanding attention in a dark cape over a black and red gown by Azzedine Alaia paired with tons of diamonds.
Viola Davis was simply glamorous in asymmetrical purple Armani and Buccellati jewels, attending the show with her husband of 14 years Julius Tennon.
Margot Robbie was chic in a custom beaded creme shift by Prada.
Darling dates: The Oscar winner was joined by her husband of 14 years Julius Tennon
Beads and things: Margot Robbie struck a pose in custom Prada
Nice recovery! Ashley Graham nearly fell, but recovered to show off her voluptuous physique in a sultry slip dress
Ashley Graham made quite the entrance, almost falling flat on the red carpet as she stumbled forward in a slinky slip dress and heels.
She quickly recovered to strike a sultry pose, showing off her ample bust beneath a diamond choker while also snapping pictures with husband Justin Ervin
Ava DuVernay kept simple in blue silk and a smart jacket.
Dapper dude: Ashley's husband Justin Ervin complimented her look in all black
She's got the blues: Ava DuVurney was simple and chic in royal blue
In bloom: Padma Laksmi stunning an a strapless silk gown with roses
Olympian Lindsey Vonn graced everyone in a sultry black gown with revealing side cuts which she paired with dramatic smoky eyes.
Padma Lakshmi wore a strapless silk gown with roses while Janet Mock donned a black lace gown with ruffles.
Meghan Kelly made a bold appearance in brown sequins and dark eye makeup. She took her dapper husband Douglas Brunt as her date.
Smoke and mirrors! Lindsey Vonn made a sultry appearance in a revealing black gown paired with dramatically smoky eyes
Bold: Meghan Kelly made a bold appearance in brown sequins, accompanied by hubby Douglas Brunt
Glittering: Olympic fencer Ibtihaj Muhammad dazzled in a sparkling creme gown and matching hijab
Colin Kaepernick and partner Nessa matched in simple black silhouettes.
Olympic fencer Ibtihaj Muhammad dazzled in a sparkling creme gown and matching silk hijab.
Media Mogul Ariana Huffington was regal as ever in her blue and cream lace ensemble.
Dark angel: Sarah Paulson looked dramatic in a dark gown
Classic: Colin Kaepernick and girlfriend Nessa matching in black attire
Tux time: John Legend appeared as one of the evening's performers
Strong ladies! Before her performance, Demi posed with media mogul Arianna Huffington who wrote Demi's profile in the Time issue
Time's yearly list celebrates the 100 most influential people throughout the world.
Notable names making the list this year include John Legend, Demi Lovato, Viola Davis, Simone Biles, Emma Stone, Ed Sheeran, James Corden, Margot Robbie, and Sarah Paulson.
The issue is available on newsstands now.
Media queen: Arianna Huffington looked regal in her lace attire
Keeping up with Miss Jones: Leslie Jones was fashionable in a thigh skimming black and creme dress
Lacing around! Janet Mock was elegant in ruffling lace
